aircraft.value: Hawk Defender - AC-8576-916 at Zone-2 Facility

defect_observed.value: Reservoir fluid level sensor failure. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Brake System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 27/06/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 30/06/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 30/06/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 04/07/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 02/07/2024 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon
